공유관리 안내문구: You can select a department or user to share the App.
상태관리 안내문구1: Each data can have status. Also, it is available to set status definition and flow.
상태관리 안내문구2: Status is only set by user who has authority below.
상태관리 안내문구3: Please select status to use at data. You can change the order using Drag and Drop.
앱 만들기 인트로 안내문구:
Default templates are provided. You can change themes below

to fit for your work environment.
앱 기본 설정 수정 네비게이션: App Home > Management Home > App General Settings(Modify)
편집 취소: Contents you input will be canceled, move to list view.
길이가 초과하였습니다: App name length should be between 1 and 64.
운영자를 추가해 주세요: At least one app manager should be designated.
기본설정 운영자 툴팁:
Designate an operator who can manage the app.
Operator can delete the app and give authorities.
만들려는 앱에 대한 기본 설정을 할 수 있습니다: You can adjust general settings for app.
회사에서 운영할 유용한 앱을 직접 디자인해서 만들어보세요: Design and create useful Apps using in your company.
기본설정 앱 설명 툴팁: App description will be shown at the top of issue list. This is about App's rule or contents to notify users.
데이터 목록에서 설명이 기본으로 보이도록 설정합니다: Set description to be shown as default at the Data list.
필터명변경설명: Please enter a new name for the filter.
You can set the basic information of App such as name, description and icon.
You have exceeded the maximum number of people.
필터를 삭제하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to delete filter?
새 필터 저장 설명: You can save the search condition as a new filter.
Please enter the filter name to change.
항목을 목록 화면에 추가: Add Item to the List View
Among the items added to the list view, please set the title property.
Selected item was designated as title.
목록 화면 관리 설명: You can change charts and list view shown in App home. The result of charts designated by manager will be shown in App home and users can change the range of data properly. Also, the manager can arrange items to the list view.
목록 화면 관리 설명2:
1. You can make list view by adding items to be displayed in the selection box.
2. You can change the order by using Drag&Drop.
3. You must set the item of the title property in the added items.
4. You can set as 'title' property by clicking the arrow(▼) on the right side of item title. Title will be shown at notification title, representing keywords of the details page, search and etc.
차트 설명: ※ You can see the chart view at the App list view.
차트 설정 설명1: You can see the number of documents as chart view.
차트 설정 설명2: Please check the chart set at the list view.
You should set status at least one.
상태 흐름 설명: You can set status flow, authority to change, and alert recipients.
프로세스 관리 설명: You can set status and status flow to use in App. All data has status and the status will be changed by authority only.
앱을 삭제하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to delete this App?
접근 제어 설명:
You can select

a department or user

to share the App.
기본설정 설명:
You can set

App's name, manager, description and icon.
목록화면 설명:
You can change

charts and list view

shown in App home.
프로세스 설명:
You can set status

such as waiting/completed

and status flow.
프로세스 사용하기 버튼 문구: No Process Exists. If you want to use status, please click the 'Use Process'.
프로세스 사용하기 선택 문구: No Process Exists. If you want to use status, please click the 'Use Process'.
Tasks added from PC cannot be edited via Mobile.
항목이 삭제되었습니다 설명: The chart is not shown normally because the item designated at the statistics by groups or way to aggregate was deleted from Input Screen Management. Please check the settings.
샘플 앱으로 만들기 설명: Default templates are offered. Try to create the App fit to your working environment.
사용중인 앱으로 만들기: Create app with the app you are using
사용중인 앱을 복사하여 만들기: Create App by copying Apps in use
사용중인 앱을 복사하여 만들기 설명: Try to create App simply using existing Apps.
앱없음 전체 내용: Only users authorized by the administrator can create Apps. Please ask your administrator for the details.
앱 생성은 관리자가 지정한 사용자만 가능합니다: Only users authorized by the administrator can create Apps.
자세한 사항은 관리자에게 문의하시기 바랍니다: Please ask your administrator for the details.
앱없음 즐겨찾기 내용: You can categorize the frequently used Apps as Favorite Apps. You can add to Favorite Apps by clicking ☆(star) at the all Apps lists.
앱없음 운영중 내용: Try to be the App manager through a simple App creating process. Only users authorized by the site administrator can create Apps.
입력항목 없음 내용:
Drag and drop items to design the input screen.
You can change properties when you select the item.
입력항목 최소갯수 검증 오류메시지: At least one input item should be added.
공유자관리 설명: You  can select employees to share the App. If you set as All Users, you can share with the entire company.
비공개 설명: When you register data, it can be registered privately. Private data is shown by only registrant and manager.
비공개 사용자선택: Users can register data by selecting Public/Private.
비공개만: Users can register only private data.
공개만: Users can register only public data.
접근제어 설명: You can select users to share the App. You can set by particular users, department members, position and responsibility.
입력화면 컴포넌트 구성 오류 메시지: Input Screen is not constructed normally. Please ask you manager.
비공개 옵션 설명: Private data is shown by only registrant and manager.
When you do not use Status, it is uneditable.
상태사용안함: Will not use Status in this App
기본 정보 가이드 설명:
You can set basic information of App including App name,
an App manager, simple description and App icon.
입력 화면 가이드 설명:
You can compose data input screen.
You can compose input screen you want by using drag and drop.
목록 화면 가이드 설명: You can change charts and list view shown in App home. You can show required information by selecting chart type and input item name.
프로세스 가이드 설명: You can give status for each registered data. From progression to completion, you can apply the process same as the way your department are using.
접근 제어 가이드 설명:
You can select users to share the App. You can set by user, department and position.
Sharing data with designated members will make your tasks easy.
앱 관리 가이드 안내2:
You will recognize that sharing tasks makes your work easy.
You can get more detail information at the Help Center.
Just one minute is enough to manage your App.
폼빌더 편집 취소: Are you sure you want to cancel all edited data?
최대 {{arg}}명까지 설정할 수 있습니다: You can set up to  {{arg}} users.
최대 {{arg}}명까지 설정 가능: Available to set up to {{arg}} users
데이터 가져오기 설명: You can import data in bulk in the CSV file.
유효성 검증 오류로 일부 데이터의 값이 반영되지 않은 데이터: Because validation error, the value of a portion of the data has not been reflected
데이터 가져오기 설명2:
Import the data of item in attached file.

Since there is a case where the value of the data is not reflected in part by the data import regulations, please check the help.
최대 {{arg}}개 부서까지 설정할 수 있습니다: You can set departments up to {{arg}}.
최대 {{arg}}개 부서까지 설정 가능: You can set departments up to {{arg}}.
등록자의 부서를 기본값으로 지정: Set department of registrant as default department.
연동 항목 삭제 확인 타이틀: Do you want to delete the linked item?
연동 항목 삭제 확인 메시지:
This item is linked with other apps. When you delete this item, data linkage relationship is disconnected.

You can check information of linked app information in the application management page.
연동앱 삭제 메세지:
This app is linked with other apps.
When you delete this app, data linkage relationship is released.
이 앱을 참조하고 있는 앱 목록: App list which refers to this app
다른 앱의 데이터를 참조하고 있는 항목: Item which refers to data of other apps
앱간 데이터 연동 설명: You can check app list which refers to data of this app and also app list which refers to data of other app in this app.
참조목록 설명: If you check ‘Permission to view list’, data of this app can be searched and linked with linked app. If you check ‘Permission for detailed view’, data information of this app can be shown to users who is not sharer of this app in the linked app.
참조항목 설명: Item which refers to data of other apps in this app
데이터 연결 시, 검색 노출 항목: Items searched during the data connection
앱 검색 설명:
When you link app, notification is sent to app operator. Permission by the operator is needed for linkage.
Once set, it's unable to correct.
연동 권한 설명:
Linked app didn't permit viewing the list.
Please ask app operator for the details.
There is no item that can be linked.
검색 노출 항목 없음 설명:
Search Item is not set.
Please ask app operator.
연동 앱 없음 설명: Linked app is not set. Please ask app operator.
수식 검증오류 메시지: The formula can only be numbers, alphabets, arithmetic symbols, parentheses, blanks, and underlines(_).
코드 설명: You can set alphabets, numbers and underlines(_).
최소값이 최대값보다 큽니다: The minimum value is larger than the maximum value.
테이블 자동계산 설명: The input value of data calculate automatically in the last row of a table component
삭제할 상태가 사용중:
Data that you want to delete is in use.
Please change data as a another status or delete.
데이터 복사 설명: If you enter value in app that can be copied or you do mapping item through 'mapping setting', value is entered automatically.
There is {{arg1}} that has already been registered.
consumersDesc: If there is item that can not be public when you interlock data of app, please set OFF.
producersDesc: This data is shown in linked app. If there is item that can not be public, please set OFF.
삭제된 연동 설명:
You can not search because linked apps and itmes are deleted or set as private.
Please contact app manager.
기본 데이터 목록 관리 설명: You can set criteria for displaying data in each user by using filter. User can only see data of filter.
앱을 이동하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to move this App?
선택한 {{applet}}을(를) {{folder}}로 이동합니다.<br:
Selected {{applet}} will be moved to {{folder}}.
It will start moving after you click the OK button.
선택한 {{folder}}을(를) 삭제합니다.<br/>폴더 내에 있는 앱:
Selected {{folder}} will be deleted.
The App inside the folder will not be deleted.
활동기록 및 댓글 함께 복사: Copy activity logs and comments at once
목록 저장 설명:
Current list can be saved.
Make many list forms as the way you intend to use.
데이터 목록 조회 권한 설정 설명:
You can set criteria for displaying data in each user by using filter.
User can only see data of filter.
There are inputs that do not correspond to grammar.
Logical operator And or Or was expected, but other letter has been entered.
Space character was expected but other letter has been entered.
다운로드 목록 삭제 알림: Downloaded file will be deleted one week after application.
데이터 목록 다운로드 설명: You can see download history about entire list of data.
데이터 일괄 등록 설명: You can upload multiple data at once by using CSV file.
첨부파일을 삭제하시겠습니까?: Areyou sure you want to delete the attached file?
진행 취소 설명:
Work for downloading data list is in progress.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
변경 가능한 상태가 없습니다: There is no status to be changed.
데이터 상세 권한 설정 설명:
You can set edit authority and sharer who uses app together.
You can set specific user, specific department entire user, position and responsibility separately.
앱 삭제 설명:
If you are deleting an app, data in the app and
data's setting are also removed. So after that you can not be restored.
공개문서만 등록 설정 시 문구:
* User cannot register private data, if user change private data public.
Please use data list view authority settigs after changing the settings.
날짜수식 연산자 검증오류 메시지: You can use just +, - when you are calculating about hours and days.
수정 알림 대상 설명: Notifications will be sent to users who have permission to access the app.
선택한 앱을 내보내기 하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to export the selected apps?
Only dwt files can be registered.
가져온 앱을 공유하시겠습니까?: Would you like to share the imported app?
앱 공유 설명:
When you click ON of Company Sharing, it will be provided as a sample applicaton to company and can be utilized when creating a
App.
앱 공유 해제 설명:
When you click OFF the Company Sharing, the sample app shared to the company will be hidden and no longer shared.
However, apps already created can be used even if it is turned off.
마스킹 설정 설명: If the items in the data require masking processing, if you change from ON to OFF, the item will be treated as private. If you need to look up one of your private closed items, you can only make it public to a specific user through the allow view entries setting.
앱 내 사용하는 항목: Items you use in your app
관리자에 의해 마스킹 처리 된 항목입니다: An item masked by the administrator.
앱 공유하기: Export an app / Get an app
앱 내보내기 설명: * After you select an app to share externally, the Works app file will be downloaded when you export.
앱 가져오기 설명: * Specified Works moderators common manage app files imported from outside.
데이터연동가이드: Want to integrate data from your app with your app's data?
대괄호 입력포맷 오류 설명: The format you entered can not be used with square brackets. Please use {}, () or <>.
문서번호 사용유무: This app does not use document numbers.
마지막 옵션 삭제 오류: The last option can not be deleted.
필수 입력 항목 삭제 오류: When required fields are checked, It can be deleted.
모바일 프로세스 사용하기 선택 문구: There is no current status. To use the status, click the 'Enable status' button in the status change.
텍스트 검색 사용 불가 문자: You cannot use the characters below. %&\
There is an incorrect exposure condition. Please correct the exposure conditions.
API 연동 사용여부설명: ※ Set Interlock Keep regardless of the setting value at the bottom.
API 연동 사용안함알림: When API interlock is set to OFF, the authentication key is maintained, but external data is not interlocked.
인증키 관리설명: ※ Generate Auth key required for interworking
인증키 재발급확인:
You can't use an Auth key when regenerating an authorization key.
Do you want to apply?
연동항목관리설명: ※ Specify the component to be linked and modify the parameter name.
인증키 유효기간: Auth key expiration date {{arg2}} remaining until {{arg1}}
컴포넌트없음: There are no components to set.
외부 데이터 가져오기 설명: External data can be automatically registered through API interlock.
API 연동을 사용하시려면 인증키를 발급받으세요: To use API interlock, get an Auth key
파라미터 입력값 체크: Parameter names can only be -, _, numbers, and alphabets
수정삭제 연동 컴포넌트 선택 필수: Component for [Edit/Delete] interlock must be selected Linked component Management
수정삭제연동설정설명:
※ Set to update the data linked with [Edit / Delete] of external data.
Please note that if you delete the representative component set for this function, the function will not work.
차트 미리보기 설명: You can preview one of the app's <default filters>
누적형 설명: ※ Cunulative type is active only when 2 series chart is set.
입력화면 관리 설명: You can add and set items to enter when registering data.
코드 검증오류 메시지: Code is duplicated or format is invalid.
3단컴포넌트삭제경고:
Components in 3 column will be deleted.
Would you like to change as it is?
앱만들기샘플안내상세: Check out our free sample app in CareLounge!
데이터 복사시 연동데이터 삭제 경고: Caution! The document entered for data linkage has been deleted.
앱 삭제 확인: Please enter the app name to delete the app.
The app name does not match.
You do not have form access rights.
폼 접근권한 없음 설명:
There is access right to the app, but you do not have the right to the form, so you cannot use the app.
Ask the app operator for permission to access the form.
필터조건설명: In the case of a filter to which a condition of a form to which the user does not have permission is added, the filter is configured with excluding this condition.
메인폼 설명:
* The main form is the basic form of all other forms.
* You can create additional forms using the components of the main form and properties of each component.
* When a component is deleted from the main form, it is also deleted from other forms in use.
컬럼을 삭제하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to delete the column?
컬럼삭제 경고: If the corresponding column is added to the subform, all components in the column are deleted, but the column component must be deleted manually.
하위폼 속성변경 불가 경고: Properties cannot be changed in subforms. Change the properties of the component in the main form.
There are changes to the main form.
메인 폼 변경 안내: Changes made to the main form affect all subforms. Are you sure you want to save your changes?
폼 이동 경고:
If you move to another form without saving, the edited content will be lost.
Are you sure you want to save your modifications?
폼 생성 경고:
If you add another form without saving, your modifications will be lost.
Are you sure you want to save your modifications?
Deleting the subform will retain the data.
하위폼 입력항목 설명: This component is registered in the main form. If you want to add another component, please register it in the main form first. However, design components can be freely added.
하위폼 추가 개수제한 안내: Subforms can be registered up to a maximum of {{arg1}}.
메인 폼의 컴포넌트를 모두 가져오시겠습니까?: Do you want to import all the components of the main form?
메인 폼 가져오기 설명: You can get all the components of the main form and exclude unnecessary components.
메인 폼 변경: Changes made to the main form affect all subforms.
시작 상태는 1개만 선택할 수 있습니다: You can select only one start state.
A state flow cannot have the same start state and next state.
하위폼데이터컴포넌트 설명: This component is registered in the main form. If you want to add another component, please register it in the main form first. However, design components can be freely added.
콤보차트 오류: Some of the data in the field has not been entered. It may not be displayed correctly on the chart.
Data cannot be displayed because the start date and end date are the same.
'{{arg1}}'와 '{{arg2}}'은 데이터 표기방식이 달라 데이터: Since {{arg1}} and {{arg2}} have different data notation methods, data cannot be displayed. (Ex. Date vs. Date and Time)
At least one date entry is required.

Please select a date item to use for the calendar view.
Work data is sorted based on the date item set below.
Enter the name of the calendar view to change.

There is nothing to register. Go to the list.

When entering a number, it is displayed as follows depending on the type.
Once the type is set, it cannot be changed after saving.
템플릿 선택 설명: Create an app using a variety of sample templates.
파일 가져오기 설명: Create an app by importing a template file in dwt format.
처음부터 만들기 설명: Create an app from scratch by adding components.
Create apps from templates shared within your company through the Import Apps feature.
업무에 필요한 기능을 쉽고 빠르게: Quickly and easily with the functions you need for work
Use one Works
to manage all your data
and communications.
폴더 만들기 설명: Create folders where you can group apps.
원하는 앱을 간편하게 만들어보세요!: Easily create the apps you want!

Drag and drop components to design the input screen.

컴포넌트 최소갯수 검증 오류메시지: At least one component should be added.
필수 컴포넌트 삭제 오류: When required component are checked, It can be deleted.
연동 컴포넌트 삭제 확인 타이틀: Do you want to delete the linked component?
연동 컴포넌트 삭제 확인 메시지:
This component is linked with other apps. When you delete this component, data linkage relationship is disconnected.

consumers설명: If there is component that can not be public when you interlock data of app, please set OFF.
producers설명: This data is shown in linked app. If there is component that can not be public, please set OFF.
다른 앱의 데이터를 참조하고 있는 컴포넌트: Component which refers to data of other apps
참조컴포넌트 설명: Component which refers to data of other apps in this app
컴포넌트를 목록 화면에 추가: Add component to the List View
간트 뷰 항목 선택 설명:
Please select the start date and end date to show in the Gantt view.
A bar graph is created based on the date through mapping.
선택한 항목은 저장되지 않습니다. 이동하시겠습니까?: The selected item is not saved. Do you want to move?
Initialize the filter to change the order.
When deleted, documents in the group are moved out of the group.
You can't move groups into groups.
Enter the schedule in Data registration and a graph will be drawn.
Enter the name of the Gantt View to change.
간트 뷰에서 사용 중인 필수 컴포넌트입니다. 삭제하면 간트 뷰를 사용하지: This is a required component in use by Gantt View. Deleting it will disable Gantt View.
캘린더 뷰에서 사용 중인 컴포넌트입니다. 삭제하면 사용 중인 캘린더 뷰에: This component is being used by Calendar View. If you delete it, the date will not be exposed in the Calendar View you are using.
리포트 공백 문구:
There is no report produced.
Please share your insights by creating a report on the PC version!
리포트 공유 설정 안내문구: Set up app sharing users to share those reports. For sharers with subform permission, some data may not be exposed.
리포트의 명칭을 변경합니다: Change the name of the report.
이미지 파일만 업로드 가능합니다: Only image files can be uploaded.
리포트 공백 문구 사용자 버전:
Reports can only be created by app managers.
No reports have been created yet.
전체 페이지 다운로드 설명:
You are downloading the entire page.
The downloaded file can be found on the Apps Management page.
이 곳을 클릭하여 우측 톱니바퀴를 눌러 텍스트를 수정해주세요: Click here and click the gear on the right to edit the text.
0이상 0이하로 입력해야합니다: You should enter {{arg1}} or more and {{arg2}} or less.
You can change the order when you move by holding the space.
You can join or exclude from a group by grabbing that space and moving.
리포트 공백 문구 PC:
There is no report produced.
Please share your insights by creating a report!
리포트 아이템 컴포넌트 삭제 경고: The component set in the item has been deleted. Please select the component again.
The decimal point is not available.
The maximum number of inputs is {{arg1}}.
The minimum number of inputs is {{arg1}}}.
There is no data to display. Please check the selected standard column and auxiliary column.
최적화된 간트 뷰 사용을 위해 매핑한 컴포넌트의 최근 등록 데이터 기준으: In order to use the optimized Gantt View, only {{arg0}} are drawn based on the most recent registration data of the mapped component.
리포트 접근권한 없음 설명:
You have access to the app, but you don't have permission to report, so you can't use the app.
Please ask the report author for report access rights.
수정사항이 반영되지 않았습니다: Fixes have not been reflected. Please save after completing the modification.
리포트 아이템 없을 경우 안내문구: Drag the item and add it here.
Even if it is removed from the Gantt view, you can still check it in the list view.
전체 진행률은 필터를 사용하거나 사용자 권한 설정에 의해 다르게 보일 수: The overall progress may look different using filters or by setting user permissions.
The maximum number of data that can be viewed in the Gantt view is {{arg0}}.
{{arg0}}개가 넘을 경우, 목록에서 일부 데이터를 제외 후 [데이터: If there are more than {{arg0}}, please add them through [Load Data] after excluding some data from the list.
간트뷰 진행률 설명: Progress can be marked by creating a ratio type using numeric components on the App Management > input screen.
Please use [Load Data] after removing data that has already been added.
폼 모바일 접근권한 없음 설명: Please ask the app operator for form access.
삭제된 폼 접근:
The app or data does not exist, or
you do not have access to verify it.
마지막으로 저장된 상태대로 컴포넌트가 삭제됩니다.\n삭제하기 전 컴포넌트:
The component will be deleted in its last saved state.
Please save any changes to the component before deleting it.
